extendedInfo.description: "With all the polish of a major, mainstream release, Yesterday is not a game to be missed." (Gamezebo)"An experience you'll be unlikely to forget." (Joystiq)"Yesterday will sate the needs of adventure game fans." (Destructoid)"The game feels like a painting come to life." (Strategy Informer)"One of the best point-and-click adventure games to come along in recent memory."  (Gamezone)The first thriller by the indie studio that created the million-selling Runaway saga!A psycho is killing beggars alive in New York. A Y-shaped scar forms in the hands of seemingly unrelated people. The press and the media just don't care, so Henry White, a young NGO volunteer, will be the first to investigate the crimes with his friend Cooper.  They are two of the three playable characters in Yesterday, the third being none other than the enigmatic John Yesterday, who is dragged into this twisted plot after his memory is completely wiped.How far will you go to find out who John Yesterday is?An adult, noir thriller full of unexpected twists and turns.A magnificient visual style that mixes videogames, movies and comics.An innovative interface based on innumerable blow-ups. A perfect game for your tablet!Useful and well-designed help for players, via a hotspot marker and text hints.A rich musical score that not only fits but also enhances the story.A storyline full of discrete references and tributes to movies, series, games, music and novels.

reviews.title: Awesome just awesome
reviews.comment: The story line is good and the game play is fun this is the best game I have played in a while
reviews.author: Will Dorn

reviews.title: Creepy
reviews.comment: This game gave me the creeps a little but overall the story line and plot was awsome.. I also enjoyed the dialogue, it kept u guessing
reviews.author: shantella hayes

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Well crafted. I enjoyed the game, it was amazing!
reviews.author: Eville Vargas

reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
reviews.comment: The title says it all. Adventure games are my all time favorite, and Yesterday is by FAR the best phone based game I have ever played! The storyline keeps the game alive and keeps you, the player, addicted! I really hope that they come up with a sequel or at least another game with a different story; it would more than likely be just as amazing as this one.
reviews.author: Kelsea Farley

reviews.title: Amazing story line!
reviews.comment: This was an amazing game! It was hard enough to make me think but still maintained playability. The story is what really grabbed me, I had a hard time not thinking about what was going to happen next. I hope to see more from the developer on the android market!
reviews.author: Johnathan Hurley

reviews.title: Awesome game!
reviews.comment: This game lasted longer than most games like this. It has a comic feel that\'s make the story great. I beat the game but I will play again for sure :) plus its free!!!
reviews.author: nicki bailey

reviews.title: Amazing story
reviews.comment: Hat off to the developers. I loved the story line beginning with a little twist that most don\'t have. The moment I started the game I continued to play until the end. This was way worth the hours. Thank you for making this completely free unlike other money gobblers. I look forward to future releases.
reviews.author: Andrew Miravite

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Absolutely the best mobile game i have ever played. Truly a work of art!  The only problem i have with it is i want more of it! This could make a great full length feature game on a console or the pc.  Bravo!
reviews.author: Mike Jenks

reviews.title: Music tracks skip, kind if buggy
reviews.comment: Wanted to play this game cuz everyone says it has a good story. The music track continually skips and it is quite annoying. I\'m not sure if this is just for S4 users but I hope they fix it soon.
reviews.author: David Banes

reviews.title: Excellent Game
reviews.comment: This is by far one of the best mobile games I\'ve played. I made it a point not to use any hints to make the game last longer as I usually fly through these games within an hour or 2. This game lasted for about 12 hours of play time for me. The storyline was great. I\'m ready for a sequel.
reviews.author: Jillian DeVors

reviews.title: Great story
reviews.comment: Great adventure game with a great twisty story. Well worth its price. Buy it instead of having the ads! On small screens the dialog labels are a little difficult to target.
reviews.author: Christian Ceelen

reviews.title: The best!!
reviews.comment: One of the best games ive ever played. Very smart and well crafted. This game is definetely a work of art.
reviews.author: Cliff Tan

reviews.comment: Best game ever. I was hooked from the start. Interesting twists and plot. Characters were great. Only downfall is there isn\'t a sequel... Please give us yesterday two! Fantastic job!
reviews.author: Dawn Kozik

reviews.title: Most thoughtful game ever
reviews.comment: Great story line, excellent puzzles, and perfect performance on my old sensation. Definitely creepy, but I loved it.
reviews.author: Leila Tudury

reviews.title: Very good game
reviews.comment: Very good game. Love point & click and this is one of the best ones I\'ve played
reviews.author: Cesar Matos

reviews.title: The BEST
reviews.comment: Just finished! Wonderful and entertaining best app I\'ve played to date.
reviews.author: Kimberly Nowells

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Best games I\'ve played on android yet. Worth buying paid version to support great developers!
reviews.author: Jonathan Murkin

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Ads make the game freeze, but other than that, great story, game play, God franchise in the making. Waiting for new episode update or yesterday 2.
reviews.author: Stephen Johnson Jr

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: This was a really fun and well made game.  It might be even more fun on a bigger screen but I didn\'t have any problems on my phone.  Worth a play.
reviews.author: Robert Bokemeyer

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Best game I have, good graphics and a better storyline. Looking forward to playing more games like this
reviews.author: Brandon Cave
